item.title: Man who appeared to fake death to avoid rape charges sentenced to 5 years
item.description: Jurors found Nicholas Rossi​, 38, guilty of rape after a three-day trial in which his accuser and her parents each took the stand.

item.title: Senate holds 11th vote to fund government on Day 20 of shutdown
item.description: The government shutdown extends into Day 20 on Monday as the Senate plans its eleventh vote on a House-passed measure to end the impasse. Follow live ...

item.title: Mexican cartel boss "El Gato" faces new charge in 2013 Texas murder
item.description: Former FBI Top 10 fugitive Jose Rodolfo "El Gato" Villareal-Hernandez faces new federal charges tied to a 2013 Southlake murder that could carry the d...

item.title: Cannabis drinks are booming even as Americans consume less alcohol
item.description: Consumer demand for cannabis-infused beverages is growing even as Americans drink less booze, with major brands testing the waters.

item.title: 9/15: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: Suspect in Charlie Kirk shooting is not cooperating, Utah governor says; Oklahoma City’s GOP mayor makes the case for diversity.
